results.content: Very broad overview that could be more in depth and more detailed. Explains bullet point keywords about different sharepoint versions, but it would help to see what it looks like in action, how the infrastructure is built, and how everything works behind the scenes to get a better understanding of whats going on.
results.content_html: Very broad overview that could be more in depth and more detailed. Explains bullet point keywords about different sharepoint versions, but it would help to see what it looks like in action, how the infrastructure is built, and how everything works behind the scenes to get a better understanding of whats going on.

results.content: I needed to bring myself to up speed on SharePoint.  The content advertised exactly what I required and in a time span that worked.  Thank you for this lecture and being the first step on my journey with gaining knowledge and success with this this cloud platform.
results.content_html: I needed to bring myself to up speed on SharePoint. The content advertised exactly what I required and in a time span that worked. Thank you for this lecture and being the first step on my journey with gaining knowledge and success with this this cloud platform.

results.content:
Easy to understand, step by step instructions and to the point.
Loved this course. Completed it in one day.
A+++
For best results, view this course on a two monitor screen. On one screen, display the course and on the other screen, have your SharePoint account open, so that you can practice as you are doing the course.

results.content: The instructor seems very knowledgeable about the training content but did not answer any of my questions, still waiting since for 2 days. Also speaks a little bit too slow, will help if he will speak a bit faster to keep students interested in what he is trying to explain and get things moving abit faster.
